# library
```{r library, message = false}
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
```


# Examining situation in USA
```{r message=FALSE}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level = 2)

ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date, y = confirmed))+
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~id)
```

```{r}
covid_us %>% 
  dplyr::filter(id  %in% unique(covid_us$id)[1:5]) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = confirmed)) + 
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~id)
```
